asset.author: Bed Bath & Beyond
asset.hookText:
http://www.bedbathandbeyond.com/store/product/myop-square-throw-pillow-insert-and-cover/211179
Makeover your throw pillow with the eye-catching MYOP Square Throw Pillow Insert and Cover. The perfect finishing touch to any chair or sofa, easily slip the pillow cover over a 20" square toss pillow or insert for a beautiful transformation. Thanks for watching. Make sure to subscribe to the Bed Bath & Beyond YouTube Channel.

transcripts: Presenting a decorative pillow covers from bed bath and beyond. These stylish pillow covers are the quickest easiest way to give a room a new look. Choose from a wide selection of fashionable colors and patterns. Then just add the new cover to any 20 by 20 toss pillow. Or you can purchase a new insert at bed bath and beyond zip it up and you have a new fresh look for your decor. Choose matching colors and mix them up with complimentary designs. Your decorating options are endless. Decorative pillow covers available online or in select bed bath and beyond stores.
